Nov 23 (Reuters) - Amazon says in a statement:: *PLANS TO APPEAL ITALY ANTITRUST FINE, SAYS FINE IS "DISPROPORTIONATE AND UNJUSTIFIED"

  • (Reporting by Milan newsroom)
